name: Pickball
description:
In Pickball, you can connect to up to four balls (one for each direction), and disconnect from them.

The goal is to connect to the balls that are lying around the level and drop them in the receiver before the time runs out.

This project was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

v0.1: This was the delivery for the game jam, basically an early prototype. I didn't manage to even include instructions inside the game, multiple levels, menus... but hopefully I'll be adding things until it reaches a decent state, so stay tuned! :)
